title: Tristana update rocket jumps onto live!

replies.body: I don't really enjoy the part of her nuking turrets, turrets are defenseless creatures that have no mobility, save the turrets from this abuse, they keep getting bullied and ganged up on by minion waves and champions!!!
I want to see a little sister/big daddy skin (bioshock 2)
Nah, that's not a skin, it's a duo lane.  Base Annie partnered with base Nautilus.
If it did become a skin, I'd see it as a single skin for Annie(Annie being the Little Sister & Tibbers being the Big Daddy) rather than 2 skins for two different champs.
TBH that would probably work better as a Nunu skin, since he actually does ride on something, just make him a little brother,
they should make a big hero 6 nunu skin because when hire rides on baymax back, it reminded me of nunu
Riot Girl Tristana looks really nice, they don't show it above.
It's not in the bundle they're advertising.

because riot girl trist is free
{{champion:18}} :)
IK why is that?
RTFA

What?
Read the F****** article?
{{summoner:31}}
Quick Question, is the Lunar Revel Starting today, I wanna know when to go buy my card XD
Nope, it starts during Lunar New Year which is around mid-february this year. :)

What is Lunar New Year?

P.S.: I'm a new player so...

The Lunar New Year is the first day of the first month of the Lunar Calendar, and is celebrated in China with the Chinese New Year celebration (which is 15 days long; check Wikipedia, it's pretty cool stuff). Lunar Revel is a League of Legends event that is based off of the Chinese New Year, and that's why all the skins that come out during this time tend to be Chinese inspired.
It's new year in China
Love this new update, but about the free skin... Can't you give us non- Facebook users it without us making a Facebook?
Someone doesn't get it.

Loving the update and character design, but I wish they could revert the rocket girl skin. It was basically my favorite skin out of every champion and now it looks really goofy, I probably won't use it again and just use the classic or riot girl :/ Otherwise good work guys :)

While the gameplay update is really nice and I can get behind it and the visual update isn't bad, I saw the new ideas for splash art and... Well... She looks really creepy in the new splash art. I can't be the only one who thinks this, can I?

I don't like the new model. It makes the tiny yordle girl she was bigger then the starting cho'gath. Also i have the feeling that she is turning around really slow now. The new bomb shot spell on E is strange too. I'm sad like {{champion:32}}
"Deathfire Grasp has been removed from the game" Ty dfg for the AP Trist
Well, looks like they have to rework teemo now, or Tristana will complain about him looking old.

Leave a comment{{champion:18}} Since it has the Yordlefication Bundle, and it includes the normal Tristana skin, does this mean that I have to buy the bundle to get the updated version, or am I just overthinking this, and being stupid?
over thinking. if you own trist you still have her, and any skins you had for her.
I love how her splash already doesn't match her in game look. "Epic fail"

pi by itself is all ready singular XD

Where's my Taric update? :c He's still got pizza feet.{{champion:44}}
ty dfg
I'm actually a little disappointed. The skins all look the same, in my opinion. Maybe it is the fact of ZERO change to the actual character, just the clothing/props. {{champion:18}}

Dammit Riot this was your chance to completely rework someone like Morde. Making him into a Menacing champion like some Darksouls boss. But NO "Were just going to touch him once for patch 5.3 and leave him alone for another 3 years." This is practically what you guys are telling us. "OH but he now get's higher resolution pizza feet aren't you happy?" No I'm not fucking happy I'm pretty damn disappointed. Sion and all these other old champs get's all this TLC and it's not fair.
Calm down, the entire team isn't working on tristana, it just so happens that the team working on her finished before the team working on {{champion:82}}

Excited to jump around as Trist? sure the abilities look fantastic but i can not stand what you did to the model and voice. Her new voice is horrendous.
I appreciate that you spent a lot of work on her but I have to say it's one thing to rework a champion and another to give a new champion the name of an old one.
Her ears are insane now and she doesn't resemble any of the other yordles.
Her used to be chubby self is now completely thinned out as to add sex appeal because that's what you do to every female champion and of course there is no way possible for a champion to actually be dressed modestly or normally have fun being stabbed through your totally protected stomach.
Her used to be bored voice that actually stood apart from other voices now just sounds like Lux but deeper.
her gun is now much more like Jinx's gun.
and her dance isn't a dance and the song makes me want to die.

nice recall animation though.

so to summarize that all you basically removed all individuality and made a yordle jinx. Congratulations you made me hate my favorite champion.
Glad to see I am not the only one who thinks this.
this is really cool!
gg
